dict.acceptation: 效率，效能；实力，能力；[物]性能；功效；

sent.orig: If efficiency can point to efficiency of mechanical efficiency, work efficiency, economy, wait a moment.
sent.trans: 如效率可以指机械效率、工作效率、经济效率等等。

sent.orig: The information efficiency includes: Weak-Form Efficiency, Semi-strong-Form Efficiency and Strong-Form Efficiency.
sent.trans: 信息效率的类型包括弱式效率、半强式效率和强式效率。

sent.orig: Efficiency market is classified into three types, that is, weak efficiency, semistrong efficiency and strong efficiency.
sent.trans: 有效市场分为三种类型：弱式有效、半强式有效、强式有效。

sent.orig: The scraping-wall greasy powder with good performance would bring economic efficiency, social efficiency and environment efficiency.
sent.trans: 所研制的石膏批墙腻子性能优良，具有很好的经济、社会和环保效益。

sent.orig: Internal production efficiency in firm is determined by external consumers ′ choice efficiency.
sent.trans: 有效率的生产效率，是由厂商外部消费者的选择效率的高低来决定的。
